FILE: cm490560v11.0.txt
DYAD: ZAIRE - SOUTH AFRICA
RIVALRY: RIV1106
DISPUTE(S): MID2148 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180623
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180914

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2148

TERRMID: MID2148 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2148 3 -- uncertain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2148 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, COW lists this MID as a clash between Zaire and South Africa, but GML recommend this case be dropped due to a lack of historical information available for this MID. No evidence of a MID could be found. 

TERRLINK: MID2148 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2148 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2148 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2148 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2148 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2148 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2148 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2148 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES: 
Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
